QuestData.Title: Up the Volcano
QuestData.Description: A whole bunch of our people headed up to the top of the volcano to mount a counter-offensive. There's something horrible brewing up there on the Lost Peak.$B$BThey're waiting for you before they make any moves against the pygmies. Those evil little things turned a lot of us into zombies!$B$B$n, save us!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Coach Crosscheck at the Lost Peak on the Lost Isles.
